stepTitle: A 1100-kg car pulls a boat on a trailer. The car exerts a 1900-N force on the road and produces an acceleration of $$0.550$$ $$\frac{m}{s^2}$$. The total force that resists the motion of the car, boat, and trailer is $$910$$ N. What is the force in the hitch between the car and the trailer if 80% of the resisting forces are experienced by the boat and trailer?
